entities.description: a phase that processes an initial sequence to identify a document s logically hierarchical structure
a method that identifies blocks as title but does not assign their hierarchical level
a model used for analyzing content and layout features to determine hierarchical levels and node types
a type of block identified by layout parsing  which may be re classified in the section filtering phase
a final node type that a block can be re classified as  such as from an erroneous tit1e

relations.description: section filtering processes the initial sequence of blocks identified by layout parsing
section filtering uses an llm based analysis to determine hierarchical levels and node types
layout parsing identifies blocks as tit1e
the llm analyzes candidates  including those identified as tit1e  to re classify them
the llm can re classify a block  such as from tit1e  to a final node type like text
